text: Norman P. Girvan (1941 - 9 April 2014) was a Jamaican economist, educator, and politician. He was Secretary General of the Association of Caribbean States from 2000 until 2004. He was born in Saint Andrew Parish, Surrey County. Girvan suffered a fall in Dominica sometime in early 2014. He died on 9 April 2014 in Cuba, aged 72. ==Related pages== *List of scientists from North America ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Economists Category:Educators Category:Jamaican politicians
title: Norman Girvan
